room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy Theory" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: This is one of my favorite escape locations! My family and I did the conspiracy theories room and it was a blast! Eric was our cluemaster and he was super fun and helpful! I will continue coming to this location!

room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy Theory" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: It was so much fun and the staff were awesome! Our clue master, Pacific, was fun and very helpful. The Conspiracy Theory room was a challenge but we were able to pull it off (with thanks to Pacific)! Thanks again for the great time and you can bet your buns we will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy Theory" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: We had a group of four do the Conspiracy Theory room last week. This was the first escape room for all four of us, so we didn't really know what to expect going in. The scenario, puzzles, and atmosphere were great. We ended up solving the puzzle with about 10 minutes to spare. The staff was very welcoming and friendly. We had an absolute blast and next time we're in the Denver area, we'll be back!
